solution_line_template: For all his activities on the train, Bret spends {train_ride_reading_hours} + {train_ride_dinner_hours} + {train_ride_movies_hours} = <<{train_ride_reading_hours}+{train_ride_dinner_hours}+{train_ride_movies_hours}={total_activity_hours}>>{total_activity_hours} hours.
For his nap, he has {total_train_ride_hours} - {total_activity_hours} = <<{total_train_ride_hours}-{total_activity_hours}={hours_left_for_nap}>>{hours_left_for_nap} hours left.
